BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: MARTIN W RICHARD CHARITABLE FOUNDATION INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: HONOR THE MEMORY OF MARTIN W. RICHARD'S MESSAGE OF "NO MORE HURTING PEOPLE" BY RAISING FUNDS TO INVEST IN EDUCATION, ATHLETICS AND COMMUNITY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO HONOR THE MEMORY OF MARTIN W. RICHARD'S MESSAGE OF "NO MORE HURTING PEOPLE" BY RAISING FUNDS TO INVEST IN EDUCATION, ATHLETICS AND COMMUNITY.
IRS990.Desc: TO RAISE FUNDS TO INVEST IN EDUCATION, ATHLETICS AND THE COMMUNITY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION IS A NONPROFIT CORPORATION UNDER IRC 501(C)(3) AND IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL AND STATE TAXES ON TRADE OR BUSINESS PROFITS GENERATED BY ACTIVITIES RELATED TO THE ORGANIZATION'S EXEMPT FUNCTION. THE ORGANIZATION MAY BE SUBJECT TO FEDERAL AND STATE INCOME TAXES FOR PROFITS GENERATED FROM TRADE OR BUSINESS ACTIVITIES UNRELATED TO THE ORGANIZATION'S EXEMPT FUNCTION. AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2022, MANAGEMENT BELIEVES THAT THE ORGANIZATION HAS NOT GENERATED ANY UNRELATED BUSINESS TAXABLE INCOME. THE ORGANIZATION ASSESSES THE RECORDING OF UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS BY EVALUATION THE MINIMUM RECOGNITION THRESHOLD AND MEASUREMENT REQUIREMENTS A TAX POSITION MUST MEET BEFORE BEING RECOGNIZED AS A BENEFIT IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE ORGANIZATION'S POLICY IS TO RECOGNIZE INTEREST AND PENALTIES ACCRUED ON ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS OR UNRECOGNIZED BENEFITS AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2022. THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT EXPECT ANY MATERIAL CHANGE IN UNCERTAIN TAX BENEFITS WITHIN THE NEXT TWELVE MONTHS AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2022. THE ORGANIZATION IS NOT CURRENTLY UNDER EXAMINATION BY ANY TAXING AUTHORITIES AND IS GENERALLY OPEN TO EXAMINATION FOR THREE YEARS FROM THE DATE OF FILING.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: BOYS AND GIRLS CLUB OF DORCHESTER

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO MAKE A POSITIVE IMPACT ON YOUTH AND THEIR FAMILIES WITHIN THE COMMUNITY.
TO EQUIP STUDENTS WITH THE ATTITUDE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE TO GRADUATE FROM COLLEGE.
TO PROVIDE SPORTS INSTRUCTION TO ADULTS AND YOUTH LIVING WITH PHYSICAL AND COGNITIVE DISABILITIES.
TO PROVIDE FINANCIAL SUPPORT, STAFFING AND CREATIVE RESOURCES TO THE JFK PRESIDENTIAL LIBRARY AND MUSEUM.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: MA ASSC FOR BLIND AND VISUALLY IMPAIRED
STORYTIME CRAFTS FOR LITTLE FREE LIBRARY

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MANAGEMENT REVIEWS THE CONTENT OF THE 990 FILING FOR ACCURACY AND THEN PROVIDES A COPY OF THE 990 TO THE ENTIRE BOARD BEFORE IT IS FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICTS OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION REGULARLY DISCUSSES POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST INFORMALLY DURING THE YEAR AND ANNUALLY REQUIRES EACH MEMBER OF MANAGEMENT AND THE BOARD TO REVIEW AND SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE STATEMENT.
